name: RandomVocab
0:
”Alexa ask random vocab a word”
”Alexa ask random vocab a random word”
”Alexa ask random vocab an eight letter word”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random vocab
des: Retrieves a random word from external api by asking for a word, or you can optionally request a random (X) letter word to get a random word of the specified length (supports 3-20 character length)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
